messages.title: BUTE PARK UPDATE
messages.content: Over 70 people attended the meeting. The Bute Parks Alliance have informed me that they will be planning further activities to raise awareness of the problems in the Parks in the forthcoming months. For more information or to join the group please see the Bute Park Alliance website.

messages.title: BROWN'S LABOUR MEANS AN UNFAIR BRITAIN
messages.content: Since 1997, under Labour's mismanagement, Britain has become increasingly unfair.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Addressing concerns and enhancing communal engagement with the Bute Parks Alliance to tackle problems in the parks.
Taking a stand against mismanagement and unfair practices under Labour leadership to create a fairer Britain.
Belief in fairness as equality of opportunity, promoting policies that further this principle.

issues.environment: The Bute Parks Alliance have informed me that they will be planning further activities to raise awareness of the problems in the Parks in the forthcoming months.
issues.governance: Since 1997, under Labour's mismanagement, Britain has become increasingly unfair.

images.caption: Angela campaigning for Bute Park along with Craig Williams
